annotation.spannedText: There is an abundance of historical data that shows the smallpox vaccine and laws requiring smallpox vaccination was not the “silver bullet” that many believe was solely responsible for saving the world from smallpox

classMention.mentionClass: There is an abundance of historical data that shows the smallpox vaccine and laws requiring smallpox vaccination was not the “silver bullet” that many believe was solely responsible for saving the world from smallpox

annotation.spannedText: The real public health emergency in America is the one that is being covered up by government agencies working overtime with industry and mainstream media to restrict the freedom of Americans to take control of their health

classMention.mentionClass: The real public health emergency in America is the one that is being covered up by government agencies working overtime with industry and mainstream media to restrict the freedom of Americans to take control of their health

annotation.spannedText: Fewer parents are specifically focused on fears of autism, and instead are expressing increased broader concerns about the potential effects on the immune system and long-term well-being, lack of adequate vaccine safety studies, and informed medical consent issues

classMention.mentionClass: Fewer parents are specifically focused on fears of autism, and instead are expressing increased broader concerns about the potential effects on the immune system and long-term well-being, lack of adequate vaccine safety studies, and informed medical consent issues

annotation.spannedText: Ignorance about vaccine history, science and the ethics of mandatory vaccination laws can all too often lead to fear

classMention.mentionClass: Ignorance about vaccine history, science and the ethics of mandatory vaccination laws can all too often lead to fear

annotation.spannedText: That fear is leading to a disturbing trend of calling for punishment for - and even violence against - anyone who questions vaccine safety

classMention.mentionClass: That fear is leading to a disturbing trend of calling for punishment for - and even violence against - anyone who questions vaccine safety
